<#if companyInformation.logoUrl?length != 0><@filecabinet nstype="image" src="${companyInformation.logoUrl}" style="float: left; margin: 2px" /></#if>
E.C.D. Automotive Design Build/Sales Contract of
<#assign totalw = 0>
BUILD/SALES CONTRACT
Date: ${results[0].trandate}
Buyer Name: ${results[0].entity}
Buyer Address:
${results[0].billaddress}
Vehicle Information: ${results[0].custbody_appf_make_ecd} - ${results[0].custbody_appf_veh_model}
Sale Amount: ${results[0].amount}
Project Specifics: Custom design process will determine cosmetic appearance and final balance due
Mechanical
<#list results as result>
${result.memo} </#list>
Exterior
16-18” wheel from ECD Land Rover range
BF Goodrich All Terrain Tires
Tailgate Mounted Spare Wheel
Tubular side step and NAS rear step with tow hitch
ECD Black Checker Plates on Fender Tops
ECD slimline front bumper
Tow hitch w/receiver
Stainless Steel External Body Hardware
Classic Grill and Headlamp Surrounds
Choice of any OEM color in gloss finish
Interior
Puma dashboard with leather trim finish
Momo steering wheel (choice of two)
ECD Heat and Sound insulation
Hand Stitched Leather Trim Seats in a Choice of Colors with Seating for 8 including;
2 Corbeau front seats
2 Corbeau mid row seats
4 jump seats in rear
Front AC
ECD Custom Center Console in Black
Leather door trim
Premium rubber matting throughout
Electronics
ECD Premium sound system. Sony or Alpine head unit with 6 JL Audio speakers
Back up camera
Trailer wiring
Bluetooth compatibility
Kenwood slimline subwoofer
Digital rear view mirror
4 USB charging points
LED front and rear Lighting Package
Remote Central Locking with Viper Alarm System
Choices Included in Spec
Paint color in full gloss OEM color palette
Leather color choice from Cadence or Torino range
Choice of wheel from Land Rover range (Sawtooth, Boost, Tornado, Steel)
Stitch pattern (lines, bars, diamonds)
Headliner color - Black, grey, beige
Additional storage and charging points through vehicle up to 4 USB
Example Upgrades - non exhaustive
Alligator leather or other non standard seat finish not mentioned above
Upgraded engine over selection noted in specification
19” plus or custom wheels
Some sound system choices if none of our brands are acceptable
Custom paneling or any exterior detail that requires E.C.D. Automotive Design to obtain quotes for outsourced work, for example the checker roof paneling to be fitted to roll cage
Delivery Timing
The build completion timing from order is 10-12 months. This timing factors in all our current clients on our production schedule and is dependent on the pace of the buyer signing off designs
The commencement date is when we receive the signed document and initial deposit.
When your vehicle is complete, your final balance is due. Following this there is a QC process which takes approximately 8 weeks. We recommend in this time you visit ECD to see the vehicle in person prior to shipping, or arrange a virtual walk around with one of our team.
Delivery Time:
The aforementioned delivery time is an estimate and not a guaranteed date of deliveryas delays to delivery time can result from back-order of parts, over run, acts of God, third party actions or inactions. Seller will communicate delivery date delays in writing to Buyer. Seller’s delay to the anticipated delivery date shall not result in Seller’s breach of this Build/Sales Contract. Additionally, all delays to the delivery date shall not be grounds for Buyer’s cancellation of this Build/Sales Contract.
Parties: The “Seller” is Humble Imports, Inc., a Florida corporation doing business as “E.C.D. Automotive Design” with an address at 5286 Giron Circle, Kissimmee, Florida 34758 and the “Buyer” is the Buyer referenced above.
Sale Amount & Billing Terms. The Sale Amount is ${results[0].amount}. Buyer shall remit the aforementioned Sale Amount to the Seller as follows:
Upon execution of this Build/Sale Contract, Buyer shall remit to Seller the following payments;
$10,000.00 on acceptance of the build spec
$10,000.00 each month thereafter until balance is paid in full. (Buyer can pay more if they wish to speed up the completion of the balance payment)
Upon any change orders to this Build/Sale Contract, Buyer shall remit to Seller 100% of the value of the change order within 21 days of the execution of the change order between Buyer and Seller unless it is agreed in writing that the monies will be added to the final balance payable on completion.
Seller acknowledges that this vehicle is built to reside in Turks and Caicos, Seller guarantees entry to said country. In the unlikely event the vehicle is not eligible for import, seller agrees to buy the vehicle back for the full sales price paid to E.C.D. Auto Design.
It is acknowledged that Buyer will be responsible for remitting all applicable sales tax due and payable under this Build/Sale Contract to Seller in accordance with state law. Buyer acknowledges the Sale Amount set forth herein does not incorporate any sales tax. Sales tax is in addition to the Sale Amount set forth in this Build/Sale Contract.
Any alterations to this Build/Sale Contract must be in writing setting forth the additional work, costs, if any, and signed by the Buyer and Seller hereto.
Buyer shall remit all payments to Seller via wire transfer. Seller’s wire information is:
Routing Number: 121000248
Bank: Wells Fargo Bank N.A
Bank Address: 420 Montgomery, San Francisco, CA, 94104 Bank Account # 7361760650
Bank Account Name: Humble Imports Dba E.C.D. Automotive Design
Payments may also be sent as a check, however please use FedEx or UPS and provide ECD with the tracking number so that this can be traced if necessary. USPS should be avoided when sending in check payments for deposits of balances.
Limited Warranty Terms & Conditions.
Seller offers a limited warranty for the work performed on the vehicle under this Build/Sales Contract. Within thirty (30) calendar days of Buyer’s receipt of the vehicle from Seller, Buyer shall notify Seller in writing of any and all complaints, issues or problems with the vehicle. Thereafter, Seller shall evaluate the Buyer’s claim and in Seller’s sole opinion and discretion make a determination if (a) the claim or issues are within the scope of the limited warranty provided for in this Build/Sales Contract or (b) Seller will directly perform any work under the limited warranty claim or have the work performed by an authorized, third party agent of Seller. Seller shall not be responsible to pay for any unauthorized work performed to the vehicle without Seller’s written authorization of same.
Seller grants Buyer a twenty four (24) month/50,000 mile (whichever occurs sooner) bumper to bumper warranty. This covers all aspects of the vehicle touched during the build. The warranty does not cover any items on the vehicle damaged by mis-use, neglect, accidental damage or wear and tear. The process set out below in section d. onwards must be followed for a valid warranty claim. ECD will not cover items where we were not informed prior and the vehicle has been taken to a non approved third party for repair.
The twenty four (24) month/50,000 mile limited warranty covers:
The following in the engine:
Cylinder head
Block
Timing gears
Timing chain
Timing cover
Oil pump/oil pump housing
OHC carriers
Valve covers
Oil pan and seals
Gaskets
Turbocharger
Supercharger and all internal lubricated parts as well as manifolds, flywheel, water pump, harmonic balancer, and engine mount.
Timing Belts.
The following in the Transmission/Transaxle/Transfer Case:
Case
All internal lubricated parts
Torque converter
Transfer case
Transmission/transaxle mounts, seals, and gaskets
The following in the drive Systems:
Final drive housing
All internal lubricated parts
Axle shafts and bearings
Constant velocity joints
Axle housing
Propeller shafts
Universal joints
Locking hubs
Front differential actuator
Supports
Seals and Gaskets
All Electrical components in the vehicle
Suspension, steering and braking systems
All upholstered items including seats, headliners, dashboards, carpets etc
Paint - Bubbling, peeling, corrosion not due to neglegt.
The twenty four (24) month/50,000 mile limited warranty does NOT cover anything listed in the above twenty four (24) month/50,000 mile limited warranty which was due to accident, misuse, alteration, insufficient or improper maintenance, or contaminated or poor-quality fuel or anything not specifically listed as “included” in the twenty four (24) month/50,000 mile limited warranty.
Despite the breadth of this warranty, damage resulting from intentional actions (including intentionally abusing or destroying your vehicle or ignoring active vehicle warnings or service notifications), a collision or accident or the servicing or opening of the Battery or Drive Unit by non ECD or ECD approved locations is not covered under this Battery and Drive Unit Limited Warranty. In addition, the Drive Unit is subject to the exclusions and limitations described in this Vehicle Limited Warranty. Damage to the Battery resulting from the following activities is also not covered under this Battery and drive train Limited Warranty: Damaging the Battery, or intentionally attempting, either by physical means, programming, or other methods, to extend (other than as specified in your owner manual and any documentation provided by ECD) or reduce the life of the Battery; Exposing the Battery to direct flame (excluding from Battery fires as specified above); or Flooding the Battery. The Battery, like all lithium-ion batteries, will experience gradual energy or power loss with time and use. Loss of Battery energy or power over time or due to or resulting from Battery usage is NOT covered under this Battery and Drive Unit Limited Warranty, except to the extent specified in this Battery and Drive Unit Limited Warranty. See your owner documentation for important information (provided upon delivery) on how to maximize the life and capacity of the Battery, failure to follow these recommended battery maintenances and charging procedures shall void this Battery and Drive Unit Limited
Buyer must contact Seller immediately of any limited warranty issues with the vehicle. Within forty-eight (48) hours of Seller’s receipt of the aforementioned Buyer communication, Seller will evaluate and make an assessment of the vehicle issue. Seller will reimburse Buyer up to $350.00 in towing charges.
Seller will not negotiate the Sale Amount stated herein. If Buyer disputes any work performed by Seller, then Seller will attempt to remedy the work however, Seller shall not be required to discount the Sale Amount stated herein.
The limited warranty is limited to any parts fitted to the vehicle during the custom rebuild and no original parts. Only work performed by Seller will be covered.
Only Seller or a written authorized agent of Seller may perform any warranty work.
E.C.D. Automotive Design has a three-stage warranty process where the customer does not incur costs. Stage one is sourcing a local mechanic or tech to address the vehicle at customers preferred location. Stage 2 is flying an E.C.D. Automotive Design representative out to address at the customers preferred location. Stage 3 is E.C.D. Automotive Design shipping the vehicle back to its HQ in Kissimmee to address on site.
If the vehicle has an issue that cannot be addressed by stage 1 (local technician) or stage 2 (ECD technician on site), E.C.D. Automotive Design shall ship at its expense the vehicle back to its HQ in Kissimmee, FL and repair in house. No customer cost shall be incurred unless issue/damage is found to be neglect. This will be discussed with buyer.
It may be necessary given the nature of the issue to move straight to stage 3 of the warranty and return the vehicle to Kissimmee without proceeding with stages 1 and 2. Only E.C.D. Automotive Design can make this decision and will do so with the best interests of the vehicle as intent.
Seller will not, without its written consent and approval, pay for other workshops or service centers to perform any work. Any cost associated with returning the vehicle to Seller for repairs will be paid for by Buyer.
If a new Chevrolet motor/transmission is selected, the Buyer will receive an external two (2) year/50,000 mile warranty on the powertrain through GM, serviceable at any GM dealership.
Buyer will be registering the vehicle in …CALIFORNIA…….. and Seller will build the vehicle in compliance with the emission laws and regulations in this state and any applicable United States federal laws. Seller is familiar with the emission laws and regulations of the State stipulated above and applicable federal emission laws of the United States
Buyer’s Acknowledgements.
Other than the work being performed by Seller in the rebuild of the vehicle, Buyer acknowledges that the vehicle is being sold “AS IS.” Notwithstanding the forgoing, Seller warrants and represents that it has no knowledge of any hidden defects in and to the vehicle, and Seller believes to that the vehicle is being delivered in good, operable condition.
Buyer will receive the vehicle only after all balances due under this Build/Sales Contract have been remitted (including sales tax) to Seller; at which time Seller shall transfer title to Buyer as more particularly set forth herein this Build/Sales Contract
Buyer cannot opt out of build process upon execution of this Build/Sales Contract and Buyer acknowledges there are no provisions to cancel this Build/Sales Contract. Notwithstanding the foregoing, Buyer may cancel and terminate this Build/Sales Contract upon thirty (30) days prior written notice if proceedings are commenced against the Seller under any bankruptcy, insolvency, or debtor’s relief law, and such proceedings have not been vacated or set aside within ninety (90) days from the date of commencement thereof. In the event Seller cancels or terminates this Build/Sales Contract as a result of the foregoing, the Buyer shall become an unsecured creditor of the Seller with respect to any amounts previously paid to Seller pursuant to this Build/Sales Contract, and all such amounts shall be refunded to Buyer in connection with such proceedings as permitted by applicable law.
Buyer acknowledges that if they are unable to remit the final balance owed within 14 days, ECD (the seller) shall list the vehicle for sale on the market, the sole objective will be to cover the outstanding balance speedily, so the buyer may forgo their initial deposit. Any amount over the outstanding balance will be returned to the buyer within 14 days of the sale.
Representations of Seller.
Seller will furnish Buyer with photos and emails throughout the build process.
Upon Seller’s completion of the work under this Build/Sales Contract and upon Seller’s receipt of all monetary consideration from Buyer, Seller agrees to transfer ownership of the vehicle listed in this Build/Sales Contract to the Buyer, certify, that Seller has the requisite authority to sell and warrant the vehicle, and that the vehicle is free of any liens or encumbrances whatsoever.
When in the sellers facility, the vehicle is fully insured under the dealers general liability policy and specifically our owned vehicle section of the policy.
The seller confirms that the vehicle is a legally imported vehicle that is refurbished in their Orlando HQ. The vehicle shall be set up with the correct emissions equipment for the buyers state as noted above in section 4i. Seller guarantees to the buyer that the vehicle will be able to be legally registered in the state as noted above. The vehicle is titled and inspected in the sellers state of Florida and is delivered to the buyer with a full clean and clear Florida title. Seller also represents that the vehicle will be in compliance with all import, Department of Transportation, and other applicable laws and regulations of the United States.
General Provisions.
This Build/Sales Contract shall be construed and enforced in accordance with the laws of the State of Florida.
Venue for any proceeding arising between the parties in any manner pertaining or related to this Build/Sales Contract shall, to the extent permitted by law, be held in Orange County, Florida.
The parties hereto agree that any dispute between the parties hereto shall be subject to and settled by arbitration initiated and in accordance with the rules and regulations of the American Arbitration Association.
This Build/Sales Contract shall supersede all prior discussions and communications relating to the subject matter hereof and constitutes the entire agreement between the parties hereto.
This Build/Sales Contract shall not be modified except in writing and signed by all parties hereto.
If any provision(s) of this Build/Sales Contract are held to be illegal, invalid, or unenforceable, the remainder of this Build/Sales Contract shall remain in full force and effect.
Miscellaneous Provisions.
Roll Cage - E.C.D. Automotive Design (Seller) always recommends the addition of a roll cage as an additional safety measure in these vehicles. By signing below and executing this contract you confirm that you have accepted our recommendation but ultimately will make your own decision through the design phase.
IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the Buyer and Seller hereto have affixed their signatures to this Build/Sales Contract on the date written below.
Buyer:
Seller:
Humble Imports, Inc.,
A Florida corporation doing business as
“E.C.D. Automotive Design”
____________________________________
By: ___________________________________
By: Thomas Humble
Its: Director
